title: An Educational Analysis of Inference
description: This report introduces key AI inference metrics, throughput, and latency, comparing specialized processors and NVIDIA's H100 GPU to highlight performance benefits for real-time applications.

title: Understanding HPC Hardware for Modern AI Computing
description: This report analyzes the critical role of fast GPU communication in HPC for AI, examining NVIDIA's solutions and future innovations like the Blackwell architecture to enhance AI training and inference efficiency.

title: State of Large Language Models
description: This report compares open-source and closed-source AI models, examining their benefits, challenges, and potential influence on the future AI market.

title: The Crash of the H100 Market
description: This report examines recent shifts in the GPU market, focusing on changing demand for NVIDIA's H100 amid technological advances, open-source AI models, and market recalibrations.

title: Art of Prompt Engineering
description: This report explores advanced prompt engineering techniques, providing tailored strategies to maximize AI language model capabilities in varied contexts.

title: NVIDIA H100: Breaking Down H100 GPUs and Servers
description: This report examines NVIDIA's H100 chip and server architecture, focusing on improvements in tensor performance, memory, and cooling that elevate AI workload efficiency and scalability.

title: Cloud Infrastructure for AI Workloads
description: As CSPs offer diverse options for AI compute, this report guides companies on selecting optimal cloud services to avoid suboptimal decisions in an increasingly competitive landscape.

title: The Age of Agentic AI
description: This report educates the reader on how you can optimize your Enterprise Value using AI Agents. It aims to educate readers on how agentic systems work and the various ways it can add value to your organization.
